data.text: @mindingottawa @GovCanHealth @DonDavies lol, a little to late for a crisis that means nothing now, since war is on the books...
@mindingottawa @GovCanHealth @DonDavies Now all they have to do is hire people to manage this equipment, because they lacked the intelligence to monitor shelf life materials and rotational stock.

@mindingottawa @GovCanHealth @DonDavies That's like the rapid test delivered to BC families with school children last week.

Only two years late. 🤦
@mindingottawa @GovCanHealth @DonDavies Just in time for them to all expire again.

@mindingottawa @GovCanHealth @DonDavies 🤔 So.... the Public Health Agency closed 3warehouses and tossed 8,839,942 masks, gowns and other goods 1yr before covid🤔all to save 900,000 per year. 
Canada’s Public Health agency’s budget is 675 million every yr. Ppl need to be held accountable for a massive failure like that

@mindingottawa @GovCanHealth @DonDavies They saved 900 thousand by closing warehouses after getting rid of and not replacing PPE’s. I guess now that it’s over they need to stock up for the next wave?  Too late. How many died in the name of 900 thiusand dollars?

@mindingottawa @GovCanHealth @DonDavies And shoppers drug mart is still charging $40 for the same test we get free from govt. So a Shoppers expert can conduct the test. In the US I can get the same expert and test for free at Walgreens
@mindingottawa @GovCanHealth @DonDavies now that everyones sick of wearing them fir what ISNT as bad as the plague, despite what the crap media reports.

@mindingottawa @GovCanHealth @DonDavies They will be great heirlooms by next year. We can all say, do you remember when we cosplayed our kids with absolutely useless masks for two years and delayed their development/social skills? Buoyed on by frantic media, and media hound doctors? Boomers and elites, dangerous mix.
